org.agreement_technologies.common.map_communication

Interface AgentCommunication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentCommunicationImp

    public interface AgentCommunication
    AgentCommunication interface provides methods for the agents to communicate among them.
    Since:
    1.0
